title: Albert Mudrian from Decibel Magazine
itunes:title: Albert Mudrian from Decibel Magazine
description:
In this episode we speak to Albert Mudrian, the editor in chief of Decibel Magazine about diapers, retrospective shows being "too soon" and one of the best film trilogies of all time. We also discuss new music from Mastodon, Tim Hecker, Childish Gambino and The Muppets.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
